message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between our original offers. I'll sell it to you for $125.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $115?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell it to you for $123, which is still a bit above my minimum price but closer to your target.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $118?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned about the negotiation, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit, and I'm not willing to go below $125. I'll meet you halfway again and offer you $122.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $119?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $121, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll make one final offer: $117. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll make the purchase.
